text: @realDonaldTrump Rupert Murdoch closed 60 local publications because he had no advertising Imagine 60 offices and staff in 60 locations. It might happen in the US when business grinds to a halt. Australia has contained COVID-19 why? Because they don't have a Trump as their leader. They have ACTED

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
